pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## AboutThis is a python library written in Rust.### Scope- convert hl7 medical format to json- convert json to hl7 medical format (TODO)## How to install```pip install hl7conv2```## Examples### Load hl7 from file and convert to json```from hl7conv2 import Hl7Jsonhl7_obj = Hl7Json.from_file("src/hl7_example.txt")hl7_in_json_format = hl7_obj.hl7_jsonprint(hl7_in_json_format)```### Load hl7 from string and convert to json```from hl7conv2 import Hl7Jsonhl7_string = """hl7 data in tripple brackets"""hl7_obj = Hl7Json(hl7_string)hl7_in_json_format = hl7_obj.hl7_jsonprint(hl7_in_json_format)```### Access string hl7 data```from hl7conv2 import Hl7Jsonhl7_obj = Hl7Json.from_file("src/hl7_example.txt")print(hl7_obj.hl7_string)```
